mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT board.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by seq desc)AS rn from board) WHERE rn between ${start} and ${end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT board.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by seq desc)AS rn from board WHERE category = #{category} and title like '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%') WHERE rn between ${start} and ${end}
mapper.insert: insert into board values(bor_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{category}, default, default)
mapper.update: update board set view_count = view_count + 1 where seq = ${value}
